issue_title: [Bug] from_dict 不验证 text 最大长度，可导致存储/显示问题
summary: Added text maximum length validation (10000 characters) in Todo.from_dict to prevent storage/display issues from excessively long text
risks_limitations: Existing data with text > 10000 characters will fail to load after this fix
The 10000 character limit is arbitrary but matches the issue requirements
acceptance_criteria_met: error message explains maximum length limit
